dcterms:description: A dataset containing eight different synthetic scenes, each with 400 posed images, used for training and testing neural radiance fields.
dcterms:title: Synthetic NeRF dataset

dcterms:creator: J. T. Barron
B. Mildenhall
D. Verbin
P. P. Srinivasan
P. Hedman
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising seven unbounded real scenes, each containing between 125 and 311 images, used for training neural radiance fields.
dcterms:title: MipNeRF360 dataset
